about_the_game:
"The first and last Orphan to discover the unforgettable"

Enchantress is a first-person psychological thriller game, Inspired by Never Again and Town of Light

The Player features Megan Sterling, the newest child to WhiteRose Orphanage during the 1930's. WhiteRose holds many dark secrets under the 'care' of a twisted Matron. A crimson trail has been left behind that must be uncovered through exploring the Orphanage, before mother finds YOU herself.

The main mechanics of Enchantress are through an immersive user experience. Exploring rooms, uncovering secrets and reliving untold history. Enchantress adopts a unique and innovative 20th Century style to capture the precise moments that took place, but were hidden at the time, allowing the experience to become a part of reality.

Enchantress is a Final Major University Project. I developed this game: levels, story and programming.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game highlights extremely sensitive content in a fictional manner involving children and their neglection based on historical events. Please understand the importance in what is being displayed.

name: Enchantress

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 8 Home
  • Processor: intel i3-530
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6100.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These Requirements are based on latest minimal Specification.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 Home
  • Processor: Intel i5-7400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 6GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These Requirements are from Developer Specfication.

short_description: Enchantress - A Psychological Thriller Game. Play as Megan Sterling in her journey to discover the secrecy hidden within the walls of WhiteRose Orphanage. Lose yourself with different discoveries and beware you don't meet a similar fate.
